amendatorysection.catchline: Information to permitholder regarding lost or stolen handgun or firearm.
amendatorysection.para: The Nebraska State Patrol shall inform each permitholder, upon the issuance or renewal of a permit to carry a concealed handgun, that if a handgun, or other firearm, owned by such permitholder is lost or stolen, the permitholder should notify his or her county sheriff or local police department of that fact.
